alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 5:21PM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In northwest Kansas, Rawlins, Decatur, Norton, Thomas, Sheridan, Graham, Logan, Gove and Wichita counties. In southwest Nebraska, Hitchcock and Red Willow counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures ranging from 28 to 32 degrees are expected late this evening through sunrise Thursday morning. Any snow melt on sidewalks, parking lots and area roads may refreeze into black ice.
info.instruction: Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution, especially at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid reductions in visibility.
